mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.username,u.loginid,u.user_type,u.email,u.phone,u.`status`,u.login_fail_count,u.last_login_time,u.valid,u.create_time, u.create_user,u.modify_user,u.modify_time,u.memo,d.role_ids,d.role_names,d.role_descs,u1.username create_username,u1.loginid create_loginid FROM ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( b.id ) role_ids, GROUP_CONCAT( c.`name` ) role_names, GROUP_CONCAT( c.description ) role_descs, a.id FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user2role b ON a.id = b.userid and b.valid='1' LEFT JOIN sys_role c ON b.roleid = c.id and c.valid='1' WHERE a.hotel_group_id=#{hotel_group_id} and a.hotel_id=#{hotel_id} and a.valid='1' and a.username = #{username} and a.loginid = #{loginid} and a.phone = #{phone} GROUP BY a.id ) d JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u.create_user = u1.id
